= Introduction =
 * Author: Bast
 * This is a plugin that puts gq info into a miniwindow
 * It will automatically update when a gq mob is killed

= Installation ==
 * see the [Installation] page

= Troubleshooting =
 * the miniwindow will not show until gquest info has been received
